name: Turisas
description:
'''Turisas''' is a Finnish [[Heavy metal music|metal]] band from [[Hämeenlinna]]. They were founded in 1997 by Mathias Nygård and Jussi Wickström, and named after an [[Iku-Turso (creature)|ancient Finnish god of war]].

Turisas plays [[folk metal]], incorporating elements of [[power metal]] and [[symphonic metal]] along with frequent [[Death growl|harsh vocals]]. They are known to play most of their solos on electric violin, as opposed to traditional guitar solos.
